topics.body:
Oh my fucking christ on a cracker!

I made a keyboard macro for dead space 2 so that whenever I press the button it's the equivalent of pressing E over a hundred times a second and it still doesn't work.

No wonder why people hate quick time events cause they're programmed so poorly that they're outright gamebreaking and bricks your entire fucking game.  That's $30 down the fucking drain.  Why the fuck am I not surprised at you EA for not fixing a gamebreaking bug that is four years old?  Why am I not surprised?

I hope you die EA so I can piss on your grave.

topics.body:
That's it; I'm fucking deleting Dead Space 2 and never playing it again.

This game breaking bug has been in the game for four fucking years and it's still not fixed; if it's not fixed by now it's never going to be fixed and I'm never going to play the dead space franchise again cause if there's a glitch this fucking bad then who knows what other game breaking bugs are in the other games.
